DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the bioavailability of a tablet of AZD1656.
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate the Bioavailability of a Tablet of AZD1656
DOC.criteria: Male or female, type I diabetes patients, female with non childbearing potential. Treated with insulin for more than 3 years. Well controlled HbA1c. Have a body mass index (BMI) ≥19 and ≤35 Clinically significant illness except type I diabetes, or clinically relevant trauma, as judged by the investigator, within 2 weeks before the first administration of the investigational product Daily use of nicotine containing substances.
